author: nhcwebmaster@noaa.gov (NHC Webmaster)
nhc_headline: ...TROPICAL STORM WARNING ISSUED FOR SOUTHWESTERN MEXICO...
summary: ...TROPICAL STORM WARNING ISSUED FOR SOUTHWESTERN MEXICO... As of 3:00 PM CST Thu Oct 09 the center of Raymond was located near 16.5, -101.7 with movement WNW at 15 mph. The minimum central pressure was 1002 mb with maximum sustained winds of about 45 mph.

summary_detail.value: ...TROPICAL STORM WARNING ISSUED FOR SOUTHWESTERN MEXICO... As of 3:00 PM CST Thu Oct 09 the center of Raymond was located near 16.5, -101.7 with movement WNW at 15 mph. The minimum central pressure was 1002 mb with maximum sustained winds of about 45 mph.

title: Summary - Tropical Storm Raymond (EP2/EP172025)
